    Get Involved

    Get Involved

    View Perks and Benefits 

    Stay Connected














Welcoming you home, no matter where you are.
 

Being an active Chapman alum means belonging to a family for life, with over 55,000 people rooting for your success. We’re looking forward to seeing you at our next alumni event, and hope that you’ll take advantage of the many resources you’ll find on this site.

















The Alumni Compact



          As a Chapman Alumni, you are family for life and will always have a home. Learn more about our commitment to you and our vision for the future.
        

Show More
Show Less




Connect With Us



          Leave your mark. Share your alumni story, update us on your life milestones, and reconnect with fellow panthers.
        

Show More
Show Less




Get Involved



          Join us at alumni events, volunteer your time and participate in the alumni board to have a deeper impact on Chapman's alumni journey.
        

Show More
Show Less




CU Beyond



          Continue your life-long learning journey and Chapman involvement through master classes, seminars, clubs and other educational opportunities.
        

Show More
Show Less




Career Support for Life



          Whether searching for a job, needing help with your resume or looking to enhance your company's industry partnership, our Career and Professional Development team are there for life.
        

Show More
Show Less




Update Your Contact Preferences 



          The best way to stay connected and aware of benefits and events is to make sure we have your updated contacted information and communication preferences.
        

Show More
Show Less

Featured Events: Regional Chappy Hours
Discover, connect and engage with Chapman alumni living in your area. Share your Panther Pride with fun virtual games, trivia and more. Chappy Hour is back to bring everyone together and we can't wait!
 
Learn more about Chappy Hours

Alumni Resources for New Grads

Once a Panther, always a Panther! From career help to money saving discounts, find out about the Alumni Association benefits that keep the Chapman Family close long after graduation.


New Graduate ResourcesÂ
